summary: Managers at federal agencies can provide important insights into how well the government is operating. For more than 20 years, GAO has surveyed managers on issues related to the federal government's management and performance. In 2020, GAO asked nearly 4,000 managers for their views on several topics, including maintaining federal operations and teleworking during the COVID-19 pandemic. This product provides the results from GAO's 2020...
title: Supplemental Material: 2020 Federal Managers Survey: Results on Government Performance and Management Issues
